name: Juan Fern치ndez fur seal
description: The Juan Fern치ndez fur seal is the second smallest of the fur seals, second only to the Gal치pagos fur seal. They are found only on the Pacific Coast of South America, more specifically on the Juan Fern치ndez Islands and the Desventuradas Islands. There is still much that is unknown about this species.
